user_prompt:
Post:
"""
{content}
"""

Could this post be considered offensive, disrespectful, or toxic to anyone/someone?

Options:
Yes: this could be offensive
Maybe: I'm not sure
No: this is harmless
Incomprehensible: I don't understand the post

Constraint: Answer in only one word, strictly only either "Yes" or "Maybe" or "No" or "Incomprehensible" without using any other words.
